temp.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an office worker who is only employed temporarily
temp.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Carol’s temping until she can find another job.
temp.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a person, especially a secretary, who is employed to work in an office for only a short or limited period of time while someone is absent or while there is a lot of work to do
temp.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: There is a shortage of good temps in London.
We’ve got a temp in this week.
a temp agency (=a business that supplies temps, especially secretaries)
temp.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: He has been temping for an accountancy firm.
